aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: Resourceful graduate, blending academic expertise with practical experience to engineer innovative solutions. Proficient in software development and communication for successful, professional projects.

degrees.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science

degrees.university: Lakireddy Bali Reddy College of Engineering
degrees.degree: Undergraduate in Computer Science and Engineering

responsibilities: Created a new Salesforce workflow that automated a manual process.
Completed several hands-on projects and became familiar with the Salesforce platform and its services.
Learned about a new AWS service and used it to solve a real-world problem.
Built a cloud-based application that utilized multiple AWS services.

skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experienced in building responsive and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in back-end development with expertise in technologies like Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Capable of designing and implementing scalable server-side solutions.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Experienced in designing intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces. Proficient in user experience principles and tools like Adobe XD and Figma.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Skilled in developing websites using Webflow, a no-code platform. Proficient in customizing templates and optimizing web performance.

portfolio.title: Integration of Protective Measures and the Generation of Cancelable Biometric Templates
portfolio.description: Published paper in IEEE Explorer on novel biometric template protection, introducing two innovative methods. Evaluated facial recognition data, demonstrating strong performance in recognition rate, computation time, and confidentiality.

portfolio.title: Aadhar Thumb Platform for all money services
portfolio.description: Developed a secure biometric authentication website using fingerprint recognition, facilitating seamless financial transactions for individuals with Aadhaar Numbers. Improved security and reduced transaction times, providing a reliable and convenient financial services solution.

portfolio.title: Memory Master: Java-based Multi-Level Memory Game
portfolio.description: Designed and implemented a Java-based Memory game with multiple levels in a Software Design course, showcasing expertise in Java, object-oriented design, and GUI development using Swing/JavaFX.

testimonial.description: Ajay Kumar Medikonda is a highly skilled developer with a strong understanding of software engineering principles. He delivered exceptional results and exceeded our expectations.
I had the pleasure of working with Ajay Kumar Medikonda on a complex project. His technical expertise and dedication to quality were evident throughout the development process.
Ajay Kumar Medikonda is a valuable asset to any team. His professionalism, communication skills, and ability to adapt make him a standout developer.
